SEARCH
Module com.gluonhq.richtextarea
Package com.gluonhq.richtextarea.model

Class Table

java.lang.Object
com.gluonhq.richtextarea.model.Table
public class Table extends Object
Table is a Paragraph with a single text string that contains zero width separators to indicate the cell separation, ending with an end of line character "\n". The number of rows and columns of the table is defined by the TableDecoration that decorates the paragraph. For instance, the following string corresponds to a 1 row x 2 columns table: 
 some text|some more text<n>
The start of the paragraph defines the start of the first cell, and the end of line defines the end of the last cell. Zero width separators (in number of rows x columns - 1) define the separation of the inner cells.
